Text: ESPN Member Name Recovery Requesthave requested your member names based on the following data entered Email Address Member Names associated with plove If you did not request this information another member may have inadvertently entered your email address in the Member Name Recovery form The Member Name Recovery feature automatically sends the member names associated with the email address entered on the form to the current owner of the email address If you have questions or comments regarding your Member Name or Password please reply to this email or send an email to Regards ESPNcom Member Services
